titleStmt.title: A new discovery of the horrid association & conspiracy of the papists in Lancashire to raise war and rebellion in the kingdom of England, during the absence of King William in Ireland. : In a letter of instructions from a Roman Catholick of great quality, in London, to a papist mutineer in Lancashire.
titleStmt.author: Greenwood, Jonathan.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in: British Library.
